about_the_game:
Hero Well is a grid-based roguelike RPG with a minimalistic aesthetic.

Explore the dark depths of the wells

Choose your hero and prepare to set foot in a seemingly endless abyss. Delve into the depths of the wells as you slice through countless twisted creatures, avoid traps and gather resources to survive the horrors yet to come.

Core features

  • Innovative column and row-based movement in a grid format.
  • Minimalistic visual aesthetic with greyscale art and easily identifiable icons.
  • A diverse set of heroes to play as, all with differing skills and playstyles.
  • Roulette-based exploration that rewards planning and thinking multiple steps ahead.
  • Multiple chapters with distinct settings, challenges, and foes.
  • Permanent progression in the form of upgrades, unlocks, and more.
  • Classic CRPG and Roguelike elements such as highly customizable runs and randomly generated ventures that allows for great replayability.

Are you able to find the source of the madness?
We will be awaiting your descent.

Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7300 GT (512 MB), Radeon X1300 Pro (256 MB)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ x64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT (512 MB), Radeon HD 4650 (1024 MB)

short_description: Hero Well is a grid-based roguelike RPG with a minimalistic aesthetic. Choose your hero, manage your resources, and prepare yourself to delve ever deeper into the unexplored wells to cleanse the vile beasts once and for all.
